files.description: Defines the bibliography system specification including required BibTeX fields per entry type, domain/subtopic/type tagging conventions, DOI/ISBN-based deduplication rules, and a source-quality scoring rubric.
Provides 10–20 curated seed BibTeX entries spanning textbooks, classic papers, and modern surveys across the target domains and conforming to the tagging and field requirements.

missionDescription: Create /outputs/bibliography_system.md defining required BibTeX fields, tagging conventions (domain/subtopic/type), dedup rules (DOI/ISBN), and source-quality rubric; add /outputs/references.bib with 10–20 seed entries spanning textbooks, classic papers, and modern surveys relevant to target domains.
missionSuccessCriteria: Complete strategic task identified by Meta-Coordinator or escalated by Strategic Tracker

Curated insight (actionability 8-9/10): Creates the missing bibliography infrastructure (workflow + seed .bib), which is a prerequisite to reliably scaling the literature survey and prevents repeated 'no citable outputs' failures....
projectName: /outputs/bibliography_system.md defining required BibTeX fields, tagging conventions (domain/subtopic/type), dedup rules (DOI/ISBN), and source-quality rubric; add /outputs/references.bib with 10–20 seed entries spanning textbooks, classic papers, and modern surveys relevant to target domains.
